name: Caelius' Pet Dinosaur
description:
Use Google Chrome or Microsoft Edge.  Turn on Hardware acceleration.   You can press the 'F' key to force browser back into full screen mode.

Click SHIFT-Reload on your browser if loading bar gets stuck.

Learn

Learn button will take you threw a guided learning of Caelius' dinosaur abilities.  Once completed then you can fully control his dinosaur.

Dinosaur movement:

  • Left Cursor = Turn Left
  • Right Cursor = Turn Right
  • Up Cursor = Run
  • Space Bar = Jump

Easter eggs :  

  • C Key = Change Skin Color
  • E Key = Change Eye Color
Dino Park

Dino Park button will let you visit Caelius' dinosaur at the dinosaur park where you can see him doing various activities.  Stick around to the end for a surprise!

Camera Control

You have access to different camera views, and zoom levels:

  • F1 Key = FRONT View
  • F2 Key = BACK VIEW
  • F3 Key = FREE LOOK mode.  Moving your mouse will change pitch, view angle and allow to you spin the camera.
  • MOUSE WHEEL = changes the zoom level of camera
